txt.en: 'With Lâkhmar being dispatched, Ghâr Mejet may pose less of a threat to the people who dwell below the streets.\n\n'Thank you for aiding in this most important task.'
Confront Lâkhmar and drive the foul creature away.
Talk to Yâshri and inform her that the creature has been felled.\n\nYâshri can be found just north of Ghâr Mejet.
A powerful creature stalks the halls of Ghâr Mejet. Destroy vile effigies in the area and confront the creature.

'A powerful creature known as Lâkhmar stalks the halls of Ghâr Mejet. Destroying the vile effigies throughout the area will make him more vulnerable to harm.\n\n'Seek out these objects, destroy them, and drive back the foul creature.'
A powerful creature stalks the halls of Ghâr Mejet. Destroy vile effigies in the area and then confront the creature.
